Class LoginSessionManager

java.lang.Object
login.web.LoginSessionManager
public class LoginSessionManager extends Object
Manages user sessions for the application. The `LoginSessionManager` handles session creation, retrieval, and termination, ensuring that user-specific data, such as roles and shopping baskets, is securely maintained. Features: - Creates unique sessions for authenticated users. - Associates sessions with user data, including roles and baskets. - Provides methods to retrieve or terminate sessions.
Version:
5/1/2025
Author:
Amrit Singh

      public LoginSessionManager()
      Default constructor for LoginSessionManager. Initialises a new instance of the class without any additional setup.

  • Method Details

    • createSession

      public static String createSession(Users user)
      Creates a new session for the specified user. Generates a unique session ID and associates it with the user's session data.
      Parameters:
      user - the `Users` object representing the authenticated user.
      Returns:
      the unique session ID for the newly created session.

    • getSession

      public static LoginSessionManager.UserSession getSession(String sessionId)
      Retrieves the user session associated with the given session ID.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - the unique session ID.
      Returns:
      the `UserSession` object associated with the session ID, or `null` if no session exists.

    • endSession

      public static void endSession(String sessionId)
      Ends the session associated with the given session ID. Removes the session from the active sessions map.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - the unique session ID of the session to be terminated.
